com.facebook.react.module.annotations

注释类型 ReactModule


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface ReactModule
    Annotation for use on BaseJavaModules to describe properties for that module.

    • 必需元素概要

      所需元素 
      限定符和类型 必需的元素和说明
      java.lang.String name
      Name used to require() this module from JavaScript.

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      boolean canOverrideExistingModule
      True if you intend to override some other native module that was registered e.g. as part of a different package (such as the core one).
      boolean hasConstants
      Whether this module has constants to add, defaults to true as that is safer for when a correct annotation is not included
      boolean needsEagerInit
      Whether this module needs to be loaded immediately.

    • 元素详细资料

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        Name used to require() this module from JavaScript.

      • canOverrideExistingModule

        public abstract boolean canOverrideExistingModule
        True if you intend to override some other native module that was registered e.g. as part of a different package (such as the core one). Trying to override without returning true from this method is considered an error and will throw an exception during initialization. By default all modules return false.
        默认值:
        false

      • needsEagerInit

        public abstract boolean needsEagerInit
        Whether this module needs to be loaded immediately.
        默认值:
        false

      • hasConstants

        public abstract boolean hasConstants
        Whether this module has constants to add, defaults to true as that is safer for when a correct annotation is not included
        默认值:
        true
